snippet: United States authorities have charged 107 people, including doctors and nurses, for trying to defraud the federal Medicare health care program for the elderly and disabled of about $452 million.
lead_paragraph: United States authorities have charged 107 people, including doctors and nurses, for trying to defraud the federal Medicare health care program for the elderly and disabled of about $452 million.

headline.main: More Than 100 Are Charged in Medicare Fraud Sweep
headline.print_headline: More Than 100 Are Charged In Medicare Fraud Sweep
